actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To revise the boundary of Harpers Ferry National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
short_title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park Boundary Revision Act of 2003

summary.text: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park Boundary Revision Act of 2003 - Amends Federal law concerning the Harpers Ferry National Historical Park to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire land to expand such Park. Establishes maximum acreage for the Park. Provides for public inspection of all maps referred to in the Act.

titles.title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park Boundary Revision Act of 2003
To revise the boundary of Harpers Ferry National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
